Text: Thank You So Much!!! This is so awesome!!
Won't sync to my iPod 4th gen that is jailbroken?

@TacoMann and @willrogers: your device must be jailbroken. download "iFile" software in your iphone (via cydia, you can get it for free, search youtube". download "Diskaid" software in your laptop/computer. then via "Diskaid" connecting your iphone, go to var/mobile and paste this .ipa file there. now open "ifile" through your iphone and u will see that .ipa present at the same place. simply click and then choose "Install". and bravo.. its done.. :)
it wont sync from itunes..!! you can go to youtube and search for the respective working of the software if ur still in doubt..!!
other substitute is the software called "Installous" which is very useful to install this kind of .ipa files.
Is there a way to run this on iPhone 3G?
